Service Details: - Registers, certifies and regulates dentists, dental therapists and certified dental assistants (CDAs) in the public interest- Assures BC residents of professional standards of oral health care, ethics and competence by regulating dentistry in a fair and reasonable manner- Sets requirements to practice, establish, monitor and enforce standards of conduct and care, and, where necessary, disciplines registrants- Monitors the continuing education of 3,400 dentists, 8 dental therapists, and 6,400 CDAs in BC
